Veratis watched the spikes increase it was definately stable, and 
very much alive. he tried to understand it, adjusting the receptors 
as he worked. he stepped around to his main console. "Shadow Wing I 
presume? Can you understand me?" He couldn't quite understand what he 
was hearing but there was always the chance that the protoform could 
still hear.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Shadow Wing::
> 
> She felt a tingeling sensation come over her. "What's happening?" 
She
> felt a little scared for she had no clue as to what was happening 
to 
> her. She felt a connection to someting, but wasn't sure about what 
it 
> was. She thought it felt familiar in some way.  It felt like 
> something that she had long forgotten. She tried to communicate 
> through the connection. "Hello? Can you hear me? What's going on? 
> Where am I? Can you help me?"
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > Veratis sat watching his monitors when he saw a spike in one of 
the
> > protoforms. "This is amazing, even with your sequencers offline 
> your spark
> > still fights to return to this plane. I can see why Lunarpine was 
so
> > attracted to you. I must study this further." He scanned for more 
> activity.
> > the protoform he'd placed Shadow Wings spark in was active. her 
> form was
> > beginning to take shape, even though he'd programmed it to seek 
out 
> more
> > compatible DNA. "Lets see just what I can do with you." the old 
bot 
> adjusted
> > the controls, and hooked some receptors to the protoform. if it 
> changed any
> > further he'd know.
